Transferred Post: "I've come to realize that people only pretend to care about my well-being. They say they're there for me, but when it comes down to it, they're nowhere to be found. In this transferred post, the attributional style has been changed from global to specific. Instead of attributing the lack of support from others to a general lack of caring or investment in relationships, the post now focuses on specific instances where people have not been there for the writer when they said they would be. This shift in attributional style allows the writer to maintain their feelings of frustration and disappointment while avoiding a global negative attitude towards all relationships.
